sentence.Network_en: The enlarged cisterna magna is an unrelated finding.
sentence.Network_cn: 发现枕大池扩大与此病无关.

sentence.Network_en: In fact, surgeons seldom see the cisterna chyle during upper lumbar spinal surgeries.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上, 在上腰椎手术时,术者在术中很少会看到乳糜池.

sentence.Network_en: Conclnsion: The cisterna longitudinal cerebrum and cisterna fossae lateralis cerebri was increasing after 50 years old.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 50岁以后大脑纵裂池和大脑外侧窝地明显增大.
